participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Fun-loving and adventurous, with a passion for exploring and a creative spirit.
participant_1.background: I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I just want to have fun with my friends. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I work a part-time job at Burger King.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate about cooking and fishing, with a laid-back approach to life.
participant_2.background: Spiderman is my favorite. If I am not cooking in the kitchen then I am definitely on the water. I love cooking but I also enjoy fishing. Hey, my name is Larry and I am a chef.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i've been traveling the world for a years.
i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.
i also like to cook but i am not very good at it.
i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go.
hey there i am 23 and i love food.
Good to see you! I like to read and write poetry.
I like to read a lot. I like to read.
I like to read a lot
I'm old enough to be a kid
No, I do not. I am a huge fan of star wars.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below

Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner: 

1️⃣:
i played football for a division a college.
i try various coffees as a hobby.
i am a huge star wars fan.
i enjoy poetry.
2️⃣:
i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.
i am very strong for my age.
i'm 100 years old.
i feel like i might live forever.
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
